alert_config.title: In Alert Configuration, we focus on two options:
alert_config.sms_info:
SMS alerts allow your IoT device to notify you via SMS through the chatbot, which uses the https://login.beem.africa/#!/register?utm_source=website&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=none  SMS gateway.

To set up SMS alerts:
• Create an account on https://login.beem.africa/#!/register?utm_source=website&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=none 
• Generate your API Key and API Secret.
• In the chatbot, type `set sms` to enter your credentials, or type `help sms` for setup assistance.
alert_config.email_info:
Email alerts let your device send notifications via email through the chatbot using your custom SMTP settings.

To set up email alerts:
• Configure the sender email, SMTP server, port, and app-specific password.
• Specify the recipient email (can be the same as the sender).
• In the chatbot, type `set email` to configure, or use `help email` for more information.
